parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the triangle where the index begins at 0

title: IWeldSymbol.IGetTriangleAtIndex
description: Gets the triangle at the specified index.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the triangle where the index begins at 0

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
vertexPt1
[3],
vertexPt2
[3],
vertexPt3
[3],
isFilled
,
lineType
]
where:
vertexPt1[3]
= first XYZ vertex point
vertexPt2[3]
= second XYZ vertex point
vertexPt3[3]
= third XYZ vertex point
isFilled
= Boolean returned as a double; 1.0 if the triangle is filled, 0.0 if not
lineType
= line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
